page.title: 15TIME CHANGE-MRS.BLYTHE(80)
page.content: In the city many things have changed. The timetable of schools has become less demanding with beginning and finishing times getting closer together. As for{unemployment,}Durham has suffered with the rest of the country, though the problem has been mainly confined to the rural areas.New roads have been built around Durham making travel easier.Framwellgate and Elvet bridges have been closed to traffic and two new bridges built to substitute them. Living conditions have improved a lot around Durham since the 1930's. There used to be two theatres in Durham,but with the building of new roads one had to be knocked down. { The Church}used to influence society a lot but now its influence is very small.
